Class UserCLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chriswlucas.restaurant.UserInterface
      • com.chriswlucas.restaurant.UserCLI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomerCLI, HostCLI, ManagerCLI, WorkerCLI

    public class UserCLI
extends UserInterface
    Root class of all CLI classes provides place for common scanner field and convenience methods

    cwlucas41
